column4: what is the maximum length of the file's name on reiserfs or ext4?
way longer than anything you'd like to use.. also it's good practice to use filenames with no spaces.. if you feel a need for a space put an underscore in its place
ok. But flac refuses to convert a file because its name was to long or contains "...."
ok.. that may be a flac thing not a system thing.. also if you have unusual characters that might also be a flac thing..
